name: Bounty (pixel-reverie)
description:
Dig through the legendary treasure chest to find the three gem boxes.

Be careful not to die by cannon ball fire or dynamite explosives!

-

Controls:

Space - Start Game

WASD - Move around

Space - Jump

Shift - Sprint

Mouse - Hit Block

Esc - Restart

-

All 3D assets, gameplay code and music were made 100% for this jam.

3D assets and gameplay code: https://twitter.com/PixelReverie

Music by Thomas Olsson:  https://twitter.com/VegaMukiwa

Email: alistair.m.obrien@gmail.com
